Key Match Events: Donovan Clingan narrowly missed a triple-double with 17 points, 13 rebounds and eight blocks
Portland extended its lead to double digits on free throws by Sharpe to make it 89-78
Shaedon Sharpe’s put-back slam dunk with 5:26 left in the game put Portland up 91-83
Pre-Game Insights: The Trail Blazers were without starting point guard Anfernee Simons, who left Tuesday’s game with shortness of breath
The Timberwolves played without starting point guard Mike Conley
Post-Match Reflections: Minnesota shot 7 for 39 (18%) from the 3-point line
